mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.tag_name, t.create_time FROM tag t, post_tag_ref r WHERE r.post_id = #{value} AND r.tag_id = t.id AND t.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0
SELECT t.id, t.tag_name, t.create_time, count( * ) count FROM `post_tag_ref`r, `tag` t WHERE t.id = r.tag_id AND t.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY r.tag_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT #{value}
SELECT t.id, t.tag_name, t.user_id, t.create_time FROM tag t WHERE t.id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ( r.tag_id ) FROM post_tag_ref r WHERE r.del_flag = 0) AND t.del_flag = 0
